require 'aws-sdk-ses' # v2: require 'aws-sdk'
# Create client in us-west-2 region # Replace us-west-2 with the AWS Region you're using for Amazon SES. client = Aws::SES::Client.new(region: 'us-west-2')
# Get up to 1000 identities ids = client.list_identities({ identity_type: "EmailAddress" })
ids.identities.each do |email| attrs = client.get_identity_verification_attributes({ identities: [email] })
status = attrs.verification_attributes[email].verification_status
# Display email addresses that have been verified if status == "Success" puts email end end
